name: Fandominion
description:
It's convention season down at FANDOMINION! Do YOU have what it takes to prove that your fandom is the best?

Punch, kick, and compete to prove your dominance! Hog the spotlight, budge into a photo frame, dodge massive laser blasts, and more!

Cosplay as one of 4 different characters and duke it out across 5 different venues! Contest for the most amount of points before time's up in Dominion Mode or battle until last one standing in Health Mode!
